name: Mines (DeathStorm)
description:
Mines is my version / interpretation of the classic MineSweeper Game. 

You have the possibilites to play the classic square based MineSweeper Game but each try, even the looses, will grant you some EXP. Every 1000 EXP you receive a Level and a Skill Point.

With these Skill Points you can buy special abbilities which helps you in future play sessions. 

Or you can buy with three Skill Points the new Hexagon Shaped Game Mode. 

Controls - Basic

  • Left Mouse Button - Reveal a field
  • Right Mouse Button - (un)Flag a field in case to expect a mine
  • W,A,S,D - Move the Camera

Skills

  • Extra Life
    You can ignore one hitted mine
  • Inspect Field
    Reveal and don't trigger a field
  • Row / Col Scanner
    See the amount of Mines in a Row / Col

Have Fun with the Game and feel free to comment. 

I appreciate every comment, new idea and possibilites for improvement.
